content:
<rule id="lombok-incompatibility-00001" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="lombok" groupId="org.projectlombok" toVersion="1.18.22"/>
                </project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="3" title="The Lombok version is incompatible with Open JDK 17">
                    <message>
                        Lombok supports Java 17 since version 1.18.22. The version of Lombok used in this project is too old and not compatible with Java 17. You should consider upgrading it.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://github.com/projectlombok/lombok/issues/2898" title="Upgrade Lombok version to support Java 17"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
